# The `Align` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This struct is a compact representation of a valid (non-zero power of two) alignment. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::Align</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This struct is a compact representation of a valid (non-zero power of two) alignment.

It is suitable for use as static global constants.

Definition at line 39 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/alignment-h">Alignment.h</a>.
